record.annotation: could be related to paNaw but lacks initial f

Spray out from the mouth (e.g. chewed-up medicinal leaves or water) (Bgs)
Boil food in a container over a fire (Bgs)
Se dit d'une femelle qui est tetee, qui nourrit des petites (Rch)

Tie up, wrap around, wind (as fishing line) (Bgs)
Flesh of animal, fish, fruit; flavour (Bgs)
Stone; to hurl a stone with a sling (Gzl)
Shallow sea over the reef as opposed to the open ocean (Moana); the shore as opposed to inland (`uta); tide (Bgs)
Sur le point de...presque, peu s'en faut, peu peu s'en est fallu (Gzl) [<]

Second person singular preposed subject pronoun(Bgs)

Etre rassemble, etre en complet; tout, tous (determinant nominal) (Mfr)
